pages.text: Being $(aoa)'s main GUI, the $(thing)Advent GUI$() is where you can find most in-game information and utilities for the mod itself.
pages.title: Main Window

pages.text: At the top of the window, the mod's current version is displayed under the left corner of the logo. If the mod detects an update is available, it will also show a flashing notification in the same location.$(br2)Along the left side of the screen are the available tabs - clicking on one will change the largest section of the GUI to the contents of that tab.
